title: S12 Ep200: The Devil & the Werewolf: a Killer Love Story
itunes:title: The Devil & the Werewolf: a Killer Love Story
description:
It is our special HALLOWEEN edition of BEYOND the DARKNESS: True Crime Tuesday Revisited.

Calgary Herald Journalist Sherri Zickefoose joins us to detail the bizarre murder perpetrated by a 12 year old girl , (at the time Canada's youngest serial killer) and her 23 year old boyfriend who believed he was a 300 yr old werewolf!

www.2harvest.com/darknessradio

www.patreon.com/truecrimetuesday
